DOC.brief_summary: From 1 January 2004 31 December 2006 64 individual probable medication overuse headache include randomize , 1-year open-labeled , multicentre study evaluate effect early introduction prophylactic treatment compare abrupt withdrawal control group ( ClinicalTrials.gov number NCT00159588 ) . In follow-up , randomized patient still alive 4 year primary inclusion time invite follow interview , evaluate headache complaint proportion recurrent medication overuse .
